nodes.bodyText: vpcCidr could be empty or null for OpenStack network.
Also we have different handling of subnet-vpc overlap and subnet-subnet overlap. May I know why?

Consider to "return false" or throw exception.
If we really want to return true, there will be more complicated scenarios to handle, for example, cidr1= and cidr2=NULL
If we enforce empty, we don't have a NULL case. Let us chat.
IsCidrWithin and IsCidrOverlap will need comprehensive test cases :-)
This validation is also needed for other post and put operations.
